title: Ults that don't feel 'Ultimate'
body:
In this thread I want to list Champions whose R skills don't have the 'oomph' too really feel like ults. I'm not talking about functionality or power, but the feel of it. Some examples of a good, visceral, you-know-it-when-it-happens ult: Nocturne, Lux, Pantheon, Amumu, Nasus/Renekton.

Udyr and Karma don't count.

Number One offender in my opinion: Ryze. When I'm fighting against him or when I'm playing him, his ult never feels like it's making an impact. I barely even notice it at all. Ryze is supposed to be a living conduit of arcane power, but you never feel that using his ult. So sad.

Brand: This is a case where the ult is quite powerful, but the animations and sound effects just don't do it justice.

What are some ults that folks out there on the boards feel need some love?

{{champion:266}} 

Oh yeah, and {{champion:266}} 

Seriously, his ultimate is nearly exactly the same as Olaf's Vicious Strikes

Take a look:
Vicious Strikes - Cooldown 16 Seconds
For 6 seconds, Olaf gains 9 / 12 / 15 / 18 / 21% bonus lifesteal and 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% bonus attack speed. During this time, Olaf also gains 0.5% enhanced healing from all sources for every 1% of his missing health.

And then there's Aatrox's Massacre - Cooldown 100/85/70 Seconds
Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing 200 / 300 / 400 (+ 100% AP) magic damage to all nearby enemy champions. Aatrox gains 40 / 50 / 60% bonus attack speed as well as 175 attack range (325 total range) for 12 seconds.

So basically, the only advantages Aatrox has over Olaf's W is the AoE damage and additional attack range. The attack speed (Vital to Aatrox's kit) is less, plus the additional Life steal, and then the enhanced healing. Obviously he does get attack speed from his passive (Also like Olaf) and Life steal from his W, but it just feels weird to have such a weak ultimate on what is supposed to be the essential "God of War" in this series.

Also % Health Costs. F*** that.
